sentences.text: April 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear DENTSPLY SIRONA Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held on Wednesday, May 24, 2017, at 11:00 a.m., Eastern Time, at the Companys Global Headquarters, 221 West Philadelphia Street, in York, Pennsylvania.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will include voting on the matters described in the accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company is pleased to announce that it is utilizing the Securities and Exchange Commission rules that allow issuers to furnish proxy materials to their stockholders on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, on April 13, 2017, we will begin sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) to most of our stockholders, containing instructions on how to access online our 2017 Proxy Statement and our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, as well as instructions on how to receive paper copies of these documents for stockholders who so elect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Jeffrey T. Slovin  Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bret W. Wise  Executive Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DENTSPLY SIRONA INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SUSQUEHANNA COMMERCE CENTER  221 WEST PHILADELPHIA STREET, STE.

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS  TO BE HELD ON WEDNESDAY, MAY 24, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting of Stockholders (the Annual Meeting) of DENTSPLY SIRONA Inc. (the Company), a Delaware corporation, will be held on Wednesday, May 24, 2017, at 11:00 a.m., Eastern Time, at the Companys Global Headquarters, 221 West Philadelphia Street, in York, Pennsylvania, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect eleven directors to serve for a term of one year and until their respective successors are duly elected and qualified;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To ratify the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP, independent registered public accounting firm, to audit financial statements of the Company for the year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To hold an advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To hold an advisory vote on the frequency of voting on the Companys executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To transact such other business as may properly come before the Annual Meeting and any and al adjournments and postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of the Company (the Board) has fixed the close of business on March 27, 2017 as the record date for the determination of stockholders entitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting and any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enclosed proxy is solicited by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reference is made to the accompanying proxy statement for further information with respect to the business to be transacted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board urges you to vote your proxy by mail, by telephone or through the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the Annual Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The voting of your proxy will not affect your right to revoke your proxy or to vote in person if you do attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,  Jonathan Friedman  Senior Vice President, Secretary and  General Counsel
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: York, Pennsylvania  April 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT, NO MATTER HOW MANY SHARES YOU  OWNED ON THE RECORD DATE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLEASE INDICATE YOUR VOTING INSTRUCTIONS ON THE ENCLOSED PROXY CARD, DATE AND SIGN IT, AND RETURN IT IN THE ENVELOPE PROVIDED, WHICH IS ADDRESSED FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE AND NEEDS NO POSTAGE IF MAILED IN THE UNITED STATES.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OR, IF YOU WISH, YOU MAY PROVIDE YOUR PROXY INSTRUCTION USING THE TELEPHONE BY CALLING 1-800-690-6903, OR THE INTERNET BY FOLLOWING THE INSTRUCTIONS ON THE ENCLOSED PROXY CARD.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IN ORDER TO AVOID THE ADDITIONAL EXPENSE TO THE COMPANY OF FURTHER SOLICITATION, WE ASK FOR YOUR COOPERATION IN VOTING YOUR PROXY PROMPTLY.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement (the Proxy Statement) is being provided to stockholders in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board of Directors (the Board) of DENTSPLY SIRONA Inc. (DENTSPLY SIRONA, the Company, we, us or our) to be voted at our 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders (the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may also be voted at any adjournment or postponement of the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement, together with the Notice of Annual Meeting and the enclosed proxy card, are first being sent to stockholders on or about April 13, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A copy of the Companys 2016 Annual Report is provided with this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are invited to attend our Annual Meeting, which will take place on May 24, 2017, beginning at 11:00 a.m., Eastern Time, at DENTSPLY SIRONAs headquarters, Susquehanna Commerce Center, 221 W. Philadelphia Street, York, PA 17401.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will be admitted to the Annual Meeting beginning at 11:00 a.m., Eastern Time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Seating will be limited so some in attendance may be required to stand, but all stockholders who attend will be accommodated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The building is accessible to disabled persons and, upon prior request, we will provide wireless headsets for hearing amplification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you are able to attend the Annual Meeting, you are urged to vote your proxy, either by mail, telephone or the Internet, which is solicited by the Board and which will be voted as you direct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the absence of instructions, shares represented by properly provided proxies will be voted as recommended by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive the Notice of Internet Availability of the proxy materials and not the printed proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are using the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission rule that allows companies to furnish their proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we are mailing to many of our stockholders a notice about the Internet availability of the proxy materials (the Notice) instead of a paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders receiving the Notice will have the ability to access the proxy materials over the Internet and request to receive a paper copy of the proxy materials by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or to request a paper copy may be found in the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Notice contains instructions on how you may request to access proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continuing to employ this distribution process will conserve natural resources and reduce the costs of printing and distributing our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why didnt I receive the Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials in the mail?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing some of our stockholders, including stockholders who have previously requested to receive paper copies of the proxy materials, with paper copies of the proxy materials instead of the Notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we are providing the Notice by e-mail to those stockholders who have previously elected delivery of the proxy materials electronically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those stockholders should have received an e-mail containing a link to the Web site where those materials are available and a link to the proxy voting Web site.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who is entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share of our common stock outstanding as of the close of business on March 27, 2017, is entitled to one vote at the Annual Meeting on each matter properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of that date, there were 230,191,484 shares of common stock issued and outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares can be voted at the Annual Meeting only if the stockholder is present in person or is represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as a stockholder of record and as a beneficial owner?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most DENTSPLY SIRONA stockholders hold their shares through a stockbroker, bank, trustee, or other nominee rather than directly in their own name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your name with DENTSPLY SIRONAs transfer agent, American Stock Transfer, you are the stockholder of record of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, or, if you requested, this Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and any accompanying documents have been sent directly to you by DENTSPLY SIRONA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the stockholder of record, you have the right to grant your voting proxy directly to DENTSPLY SIRONA or to vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also vote on the Internet or by telephone, as described in the Notice and below under the heading How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in a stock brokerage account or by a bank or other holder of record, you are considered the beneficial owner of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and any accompanying documents have been forwarded to you by your broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner, you have the right to direct your broker, bank or other holder of record how to vote your shares and are also invited to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, since you are not the stockholder of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the meeting, unless you obtain a legal proxy from the broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker, bank or other holder of record is obligated to provide you with a voting instruction card for you to use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also follow the instructions for voting by telephone or on the Internet as described in the Notice and below under the heading How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can save us the expense of a second mailing by voting promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please refer to the summary instructions below and those included on your Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials or proxy card or, for shares held in street name, the voting instruction card included by your broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote using any of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Mail
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Complete, sign and date the proxy card or voting instruction card and return it in the prepaid envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record and you return your signed proxy card but do not indicate your voting preferences, the persons named in the proxy card will vote the shares represented by your proxy card as recommended by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By telephone or on the Internet
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and Internet voting procedures established by DENTSPLY SIRONA for stockholders of record are designed to authenticate your identity, to allow you to give your voting instructions and to confirm that those instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote by calling the toll-free telephone number on your proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please have your proxy card in hand when you call.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Easy-to-follow voice prompts will allow you to vote your shares and confirm that your instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The website for Internet voting is www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please have your proxy card in hand when you go to the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As with telephone voting, you can confirm that your instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote on the Internet, you also can request electronic delivery of future proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Telephone and Internet voting facilities for stockholders of record will be available until 11:59 p.m., Eastern Time, on May 23, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The availability of telephone and Internet voting for beneficial owners will depend on the voting processes of your broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, we recommend that you follow the voting instructions in the materials you receive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet, you do not have to return your proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In person at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record who attend the Annual Meeting may vote in person at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may be asked to present proof of ownership of DENTSPLY SIRONA common stock and identification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your proxy card, or a copy thereof if you have already voted, would be considered proof of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: also be represented by another person at the meeting by executing a proper proxy designating that person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, you must obtain a legal proxy from your broker, bank or other holder of record and present it to the inspectors of election with your ballot to be able to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What can I do if I change my mind after I vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you can revoke your proxy before it is exercised by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: giving written notice to the Secretary of the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: delivering a valid, later-dated proxy, or a later-dated vote by telephone or on the Internet, in a timely manner; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: manner; or  voting by ballot at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares, you may submit new voting instructions by contacting your bank, broker or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares for which proxies have been properly submitted and not revoked will be voted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What shares are included on the proxy card?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you will receive only one proxy card for all the shares you hold of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a DENTSPLY SIRONA employee, you will receive a proxy or voting instruction card for all the shares you hold in a DENTSPLY SIRONA employee plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not vote your shares or specify your voting instructions on your proxy or voting instruction card, the administrator or Trustee of the applicable plan will vote your shares in accordance with the terms of your plan and/or the Trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To allow sufficient time for voting by the administrator or trustee of the applicable plan, your voting instructions must be received by May 19, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner, you will receive voting instructions from your broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding and how does it affect me?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted a procedure called householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is a procedure that reduces the Companys printing costs and postage fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, stockholders of record who have the same address and last name and do not participate in electronic delivery of proxy materials will receive only one copy of our Notice of Annual Meeting, Proxy Statement and the 2016 Annual Report, unless we are notified that one or more of these stockholders wishes to continue receiving individual copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you participate in householding and wish to receive a separate copy of this Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and the accompanying documents, or if you do not wish to continue to participate in householding and prefer to receive separate copies of these documents in the future, please contact Broadridge, either by calling toll-free (800) 542-1061, or by writing to Broadridge Investor Communication Services, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York, 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who participate in householding will continue to receive separate proxy cards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are eligible for householding, but you and other stockholders of record with whom you share an address currently receive multiple copies of the Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement and any accompanying documents, or if you hold DENTSPLY SIRONA stock in more than one account, and in either case you wish to receive only a single copy of each of these documents for your household, please contact Broadridge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may contact Broadridge either by calling toll-free (800) 542-1061, or by writing to Broadridge Investor Communication Services, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York, 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner, you can request information about householding from your broker, bank or other holder of record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We strongly encourage your participation in the householding program, and believe that it will benefit both you and the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Not only will it reduce the volume of duplicate information that you receive in your household, but it will also reduce our printing and mailing costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is there a list of stockholders entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A complete list of the stockholders of record entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting will be available for examination by any stockholder at the Annual Meeting and for a period of at least ten days prior to the meeting, for any purpose germane to the meeting, between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m., at the office of the Companys Secretary, Susquehanna Commerce Center, 221 W. Philadelphia Street, York, Pennsylvania 17401.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner whose shares are held of record by a broker, you must instruct the broker how to vote your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide voting instructions, your shares will not be voted on any proposal on which the broker does not have discretionary authority to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In these cases, the broker can register your shares as being present at the Annual Meeting for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum but will not be able to vote on those matters for which specific authorization is required under the rules of NASDAQ.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2017 meeting, your broker does not have discretionary authority to vote on the election of directors, on the advisory Say-on-Pay vote, or on the Say-on-Frequency vote, without instructions from you, in which case a broker non-vote will occur and your shares will not be voted on these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, it is particularly important that beneficial owners instruct their brokers how they wish to vote their shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a quorum for the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence of the holders of stock representing a majority of the voting power of all shares of stock issued and outstanding and entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting, in person or represented by proxy, is necessary to constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the voting requirements to elect the directors and to approve each of the proposals discussed in this Proxy Statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Vote Required Broker  Discretionary  Voting  Allowed Effect of Broker  Non-Vote Effect of  Abstention Election of directors Majority of votes cast No Not counted as for or against Not counted as for or against Ratification of Auditor Majority of votes present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote Yes Not counted as for or against Counted as vote against Advisory vote on executive compensation Majority of votes present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote No Not counted as for or against Counted as vote against Advisory vote on frequency of vote on executive compensation Highest number of votes cast in favor of one of the three frequency options No Not counted as for or against any frequency option Not counted as for or against any frequency option
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you abstain from voting or there is a broker non-vote on any matter for which the vote required is a majority of the votes cast, your abstention or broker non-vote will not affect the outcome of such vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you abstain from voting on any matter for which the vote required is a majority of outstanding stock entitled to vote or a majority of votes present in person or by proxy and entitled to vote, your abstention will count as a vote against.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How will my shares be voted at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting, the proxy (the persons named in the proxy card or, if applicable, their substitutes) will vote your shares as you instruct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign your proxy card and return it without indicating how you would like to vote your shares, your proxy will be voted as the Board recommends, which is:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of each of the director nominees named in this Proxy Statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the appointment of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) as our independent registered public accounting firm for the 2017 fiscal year; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of the executive compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the approval, on an advisory basis, of ONE YEAR as the frequency for an advisory vote on the compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Could other matters be decided at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the date this Proxy Statement was printed, we did not know of any matters to be raised at the Annual Meeting other than those set forth in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you return your signed and completed proxy card or vote by telephone or on the Internet and other matters are properly presented at the Annual Meeting for consideration, the proxy appointed by the Board, as noted on the proxy card, will have the discretion to vote on those matters for you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2016 Merger
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective February 29, 2016, Sirona Dental Systems, Inc. (Sirona) became a wholly owned subsidiary of DENTSPLY International Inc. (DENTSPLY), pursuant to that certain Agreement and Plan of Merger, dated as of September 15, 2015 (the Merger).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following the Merger, DENTSPLY and Sirona commenced operation as a combined company under the name DENTSPLY SIRONA Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that the following directors are independent under Rule 5605 of the NASDAQ Stock Market LLC (NASDAQ Rule 5605): Michael C. Alfano, David K. Beecken, Eric K. Brandt, Michael J. Coleman, Willie A. Deese, Thomas Jetter, Arthur D. Kowaloff, Harry M. Jansen Kraemer, Jr., and Francis J. Lunger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board oversees the management of risks inherent in the operation of the Companys businesses and the implementation of its strategic plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this regard, the Board seeks to understand and oversee the most critical risks relating to the Companys business, allocate responsibilities for the oversight of risks among the full Board and its committees, and see that management has in place effective systems and processes for managing risks facing the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks falling within this area include but are not limited to general business and industry risks, operating risks, financial risks and compliance and regulatory risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overseeing risk is an ongoing process and is inherently tied to the Companys operations and overall strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Board considers risk throughout the year and with respect to specific proposed actions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Board oversees risk, Company management is charged with identifying and managing risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has robust internal processes and a strong internal control environment to identify and manage risks and to communicate information about risk to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk management is not allocated to a single risk management officer within the Company, but rather is administered by management in an approach that is designed to ensure that the most significant risks to the Company, on a consolidated basis, are being managed and monitored appropriately.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process includes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: identifying the material risks that the Company faces;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: establishing and assessing processes for managing that risk;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: determining the Companys risk appetite and mitigation strategies and responsibilities; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: making regular reports to the Board on managements assessment of exposure to risk and steps management has taken to monitor and deal with such exposure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board implements its risk oversight function both as a whole and through delegation to the Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These committees meet regularly and report back to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In performing this function, each committee has full access to management, as well as the ability to engage advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Committees of the Board below for more information regarding the roles and responsibilities of the Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, the Companys leadership structure, discussed in Board Leadership below, supports the risk oversight function of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, independent directors chair the Board committees involved with risk oversight and there is open communication between senior management and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards current leadership structure consists of an Executive Chairman, who was Chairman and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of DENTSPLY prior to the Merger, and a Lead Director, who is an independent director designated by the independent members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DENTSPLY SIRONA believes that separating the roles of Executive Chairman and CEO provides an optimal structure for the corporate governance of DENTSPLY SIRONA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, the Board believes that such a governance structure benefits the interests of DENTSPLY SIRONA and its stockholders during the post-Merger integration process by utilizing the experience, leadership and knowledge of both Mr. Wise as Executive Chairman and Mr. Slovin as CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current Lead Director is Thomas Jetter, who was also Lead Director in 2016 following the consummation of the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of the Lead Director is generally described in the Companys Corporate Governance Guidelines and includes the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) call for and preside at executive sessions of the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) provide the Executive Chairman with input into the agenda for Board meetings, and on other matters as deemed appropriate by the Board, or on behalf of the independent directors, and recommend the agenda for executive sessions of independent directors, to the extent deemed necessary; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) be available for consultation with other directors and apprise the Executive Chairman and CEO, as appropriate, of activities of the Board in executive sessions of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards independent directors regularly meet in executive session without the presence of management, including the Executive Chairman and the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director presides at these meetings and provides the Boards guidance and feedback to the Executive Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On a regular basis, the Board and its committees receive valuable information and insight from management on the status of the Company and the Companys current and future issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the leadership roles of the Companys Executive Chairman and the Lead Director, and the existence of a Board comprised of the CEO and strong and independent directors, the Board believes its current leadership structure is in the best interests of the Company and its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings and Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The DENTSPLY SIRONA Board held six meetings during 2016, one of which was a telephonic meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent members of the Board met regularly without management present, and these executive sessions were led by the Boards Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No directors attended fewer than 75% of the total number of meetings of the Board and the meetings of any committee of the Board on which a director served during the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for selecting and retaining the independent registered public accounting firm, setting the independent registered public accounting firms compensation, pre-approving all auditing and permitted non-audit services by the independent registered public accounting firm, reviewing with the independent registered public accounting firm the scope and results of the audit, reviewing the adequacy and effectiveness of the Companys system of internal control, overseeing the Companys compliance and ethics program, and performing the other duties set forth in the Audit Committee Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This charter is reviewed at least annually by the Audit Committee and the Board, and it is amended as deemed appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the current Audit Committee members are, and all of the 2016 Audit Committee members were, independent as defined in NASDAQ Rule 5605.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Board has determined that the current Audit Committee members are, and the 2016 Audit Committee members were, Audit Committee Financial Experts under the rules and regulations of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee held eight meetings during 2016, five of which were telephonic meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee is responsible for identifying and recommending individuals as nominees to serve on the Board, reviewing and recommending Board policies and governance practices and appraising the performance of the Board, managing risks associated with the independence of the Board, potential conflicts of interest and overall corporate governance, and performing the other duties set forth in the Governance Committee Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the current Governance Committee members are, and all of the 2016 Governance Committee members were, independent as defined in NASDAQ Rule 5605.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee held five meetings during 2016, one of which was a telephonic meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the policy of the Governance Committee to consider any candidates for nomination to the Board who are recommended and submitted by stockholders in accordance with the Companys by-laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No such candidates were submitted to the Company for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committees policy is to evaluate any proposed candidates under the criteria utilized by the Governance Committee to evaluate all potential nominees, including, at a minimum, the following attributes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the proven ability and experience to bring informed, thoughtful and well-considered opinions to corporate management and the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the competence, maturity and integrity to monitor and evaluate the Companys management, performance and policies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the willingness and ability to devote the necessary time and effort required for service on the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the capacity to provide additional strength, diversity of view and new perceptions to the Board and its activities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the necessary measure of communication skills and self-confidence to ensure ease of participation in Board discussion; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the experience of holding or having held a senior position with a significant business corporation or a position of senior leadership in an educational, medical, religious, or other non-profit institution or foundation of significance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Governance Committee engages in a process to identify director candidates, other than directors standing for re-election, the Governance Committee polls the existing directors for recommendations and sometimes utilizes the service of a search firm to identify potential candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All potential candidates are screened relative to their qualifications and go through an interview process with the Governance Committee and, if desired, by other members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Governance Committee uses a search firm, a fee is paid for such services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recognizes the value of having a Board comprised of individuals who have varied experience and can bring different perspectives to Board discussions and activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this reason, when considering nominees for Board seats, the Governance Committee considers the diversity of nominees or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: candidates for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Included in the criteria the Governance Committee considers in evaluating candidates for the Board is to identify candidates who have the capacity to provide additional strength and diversity of view to the Board and its activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that having directors of diverse gender, race, and ethnicity, along with varied skills and experiences, contributes to a balanced and effective Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has recently revised its Corporate Governance Guidelines and Policies in order to further emphasize its commitment to a policy of inclusiveness and ensure that the Governance Committee, in performing its responsibilities to review director candidates and recommend candidates to the Board for election, includes candidates with a diversity of ethnicity, race and gender in each pool of candidates from which Board nominees are chosen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee shall actively consider for selection as directors those persons who possess a diversity of experience, gender, race and ethnicity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The revised Corporate Governance Guidelines and Policies are available on the Companys website at www.dentsplysirona.com under Investors  Corporate Governance  Documents & Charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HR Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee is responsible for evaluating and administering compensation levels for all senior officers of the Company, reviewing and evaluating employee compensation generally and employee benefit plans, overseeing and evaluating the risks associated with the Companys compensation philosophy and programs, and other activities as set forth in the HR Committee Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of the HR Committee with respect to executive compensation is to oversee DENTSPLY SIRONAs compensation plans and policies, administer its equity incentive plans, and determine the compensation of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to this HR Committee oversight, all of the independent members of the Board approve the compensation of the Executive Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the current HR Committee members are, and all of the 2016 HR Committee members were, independent as defined in NASDAQ Rule 5605.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee held eight meetings during 2016, four of which were telephonic meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, prior to the consummation of the Merger, DENTSPLY and Sirona established a joint working group consisting of three members from the HR Committee of the board of directors of DENTSPLY and two members of the Compensation Committee of the board of directors of Sirona (the Joint Committee).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Joint Committee held four meetings in 2015, three of which were telephonic meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During such meeting, the Joint Committee developed, among other things, the terms of compensation and new employment agreements to be entered into with Messrs. Wise and Slovin in connection with the Merger, in accordance with the Compensation Principles approved by the boards of directors of both companies, which provided a framework pursuant to which new compensation arrangements were to be developed and entered into.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Joint Committee consisted of the following members:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DENTSPLY HR Committee: Michael C. Alfano, Eric K. Brandt and Michael J. Coleman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sirona Compensation Committee: Arthur D. Kowaloff and Timothy P. Sullivan .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Former independent director of Sirona who retired effective February 29, 2016.

sentences.text: Nominating Candidates for Election to the Board or Proposing Other Business to be Brought before the  Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys by-laws require that stockholders seeking to nominate persons for election to the Board, or to propose other business to be brought before an Annual Meeting of Stockholders, comply with certain procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advance notice of stockholder-proposed business to be brought before an Annual Meeting must be given to the Secretary of the Company not less than 90 days and not more than 120 days prior to the anniversary date of the immediately preceding Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To propose business for an Annual Meeting, a stockholder must specify in writing the business desired to be brought before the Annual Meeting and the reasons for conducting such business at the Annual Meeting, the proposing stockholders name and address, the class and number of shares beneficially owned by the stockholder, and any material interest of the stockholder in such business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Companys by-laws also provide that a stockholder may request that persons be nominated for election as directors by submitting such request, together with the written consent of the persons proposed to be nominated, to the Secretary of the Company not less than 90 days and not more than 120 days prior to the anniversary date of the immediately preceding Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be in proper form, the nominating stockholder must set forth in writing, as to each proposed nominee, the nominees age, business address, residence address, principal occupation or employment, the class and number of shares of the Company beneficially owned by such person and such other information related to such person as is required to be disclosed by applicable law, and, as to the stockholder submitting the request, such stockholders name and address as they appear on the Companys books and the class and number of shares of the Company owned beneficially by such person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, commencing after the Companys 2017 Annual Meeting, a stockholder, or a group of no more than 20 stockholders, owning at least three percent of the Companys outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years, will be permitted to nominate and include in the Companys proxy materials for its Annual Meeting of Stockholders director nominees constituting up to the greater of two directors or 20% of the total number of directors then serving on the Board, provided that such request for nomination and inclusion be submitted to the Secretary of the Company not less than 120 days and not more than 150 days prior to the anniversary date of the immediately preceding Annual Meeting, and provided further that the stockholder(s) and their nominee(s) satisfy the eligibility, procedural and disclosure requirements set forth in ARTICLE I, Section 12a of the Companys Third Amended and Restated By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at Annual Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to Company policy, it is expected that Board members will attend the Annual Stockholders Meeting, either in person, electronically or telephonically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, all Board members attended the Companys Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Person Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Related Person Transactions (as defined below) were noted for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has a written policy and procedures with respect to the review and approval of Related Person Transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee reviews the material facts of all Related Person Transactions that require the Governance Committees approval and either approves or disapproves of the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: entry into the Related Person Transaction, subject to certain identified exceptions described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining whether to approve or ratify a Related Person Transaction, the Governance Committee takes into account, among other factors it deems appropriate, whether the Related Person Transaction is on terms no less favorable than terms generally available to an unaffiliated third-party under the same or similar circumstances and the extent of the interest of the Related Person (as defined by Item 404 of SEC Regulation S-K) in the Related Person Transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Governance Committee is delegated the authority by the Board to approve Related Person Transactions that, because of timing or scheduling, are not feasible to be approved by the full Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy applies to any transaction, arrangement or relationship in which the Company (including any of its subsidiaries) will be a participant and in which any Related Person will have a direct or indirect material interest, and the amount involved exceeds $120,000 (a Related Person Transaction).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee has pre-approved, under the policy, the following Related Person Transactions without regard to the amount involved:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. any Related Person Transaction involving the compensation, employment and/or benefits of an executive officer of the Company if the compensation arising from the Related Person Transaction is required to be reported in the Companys proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. any Related Person Transaction involving the compensation, employment and/or benefits of an executive officer of the Company that is not a Named Executive Officer (as that term is defined in Item 402
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)(3) of SEC Regulation S-K) if
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the executive officer is not an immediate family member of another executive officer or director of the Company,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the compensation arising from the Related Person Transaction would have been reported under Item 402 as compensation earned for services to the Company if the executive officer was a Named Executive Officer, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) such compensation has been approved, or recommended to the Board for approval, by the HR Committee of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. any Related Person Transaction involving the compensation, services and/or benefits of a director if the compensation arising from the Related Person Transaction is required to be reported in the Companys proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. any Related Person Transaction where the Related Persons interest arises solely from the ownership of the Companys common stock and all holders of the Companys common stock received the same benefit on a pro-rata basis;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. any Related Person Transaction with a Related Person involving the rendering of services as a common or contract carrier, or public utility, at rates or charges fixed in conformity with law or governmental authority;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. any Related Person Transaction with a Related Person involving services as a bank depository of funds, transfer agent, registrar, trustee under a trust indenture, or similar services; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. any Related Person Transaction in which the interest of the Related Person arises solely from such persons position as a director of another firm, corporation or other entity that is a party to the Related Person Transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except to the extent pre-approved, as noted above, Related Person Transactions are subject to the following procedures:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Related Person notifies the General Counsel of the Company of any proposed Related Person Transaction, including the Related Persons relationship to the Company and interest in the proposed Related Person Transaction; the material terms of the proposed Related Person Transaction; the benefits to the Company of the proposed Related Person Transaction; and the availability from alternative sources of the products or services that are the subject of the proposed Related Person Transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposed Related Person Transaction is submitted to the Governance Committee for consideration at the next Governance Committee meeting or, if the General Counsel, after consultation with the CEO or the CFO, determines that the Company should not wait until the next Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee meeting, to the Chair of the Governance Committee, acting pursuant to authority delegated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Related Person Transactions approved pursuant to delegated authority by the Chair of the Governance Committee is reported to the Governance Committee at the next Governance Committee meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent the Company becomes aware of a Related Person Transaction that was not previously approved under this policy, it shall be promptly reviewed as described above and be ratified, amended or terminated, as determined appropriate by the Governance Committee.

sentences.text: Board Shareholding Requirement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the policy of the Board that all directors hold an equity interest in the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Toward this end, the Board expects that all directors own, or acquire within five years of first becoming a director, shares of common stock of the Company (including share units held under the Companys Deferred Compensation Plan (as defined below), or any successor plan, and restricted stock units, but not including stock options) having a market value of at least five times the annual retainer paid to Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recognizes that exceptions to this policy may be necessary or appropriate in individual cases, and may approve such exceptions from time to time as it deems appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To date the Board has not approved any such exceptions to this policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Second Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation and the Third Amended and Restated By-Laws of the Company provide that the number of directors (which is to be not less than three) is to be determined from time to time by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is currently comprised of eleven persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eleven directors are nominees for election to the Board this year for a one-year term expiring at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees are current Company directors and all non-employee directors have been determined by the Board to be independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee reviewed the qualifications of each of the nominees and recommended to our Board that each nominee be submitted to a vote of our stockholders at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy named in the proxy card and on the Internet voting site intends to vote for the election of the eleven nominees listed below unless otherwise instructed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a holder does not wish his or her shares to be voted for a particular nominee, the holder must identify the exception in the appropriate space provided on the proxy card or on the Internet site, in which event the shares will be voted as otherwise indicated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees has agreed to be named and to serve, and we expect each nominee to be able to serve if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee becomes unable to serve, the proxy may vote for another person designated by the Board or the Board may reduce the number of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has no reason to believe that any nominee will be unable to serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee appointed PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC), independent registered public accounting firm, to audit the financial statements of the Company and to audit the Companys internal control over financial reporting for the year ending December 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the audit of the Companys financial statements, it is expected that PwC will also audit the financial statements of certain subsidiaries of the Company at the close of their current fiscal years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative of PwC will be present at the Annual Meeting and will have the opportunity to make a statement, if such person desires to do so, and to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following is a summary and description of the fees billed to the Company by PwC for professional services rendered during 2016 and 2015 (in thousands); provided that the Company as used in this Proposal 2 refers to DENTSPLY for the time periods prior to the consummation of the Merger, and to DENTSPLY SIRONA for the time periods following the consummation of the Merger:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Audit fees were for professional services rendered for each of the indicated fiscal years in connection with the audits of the Companys annual consolidated financial statements included in its Form 10-K and review of quarterly consolidated financial statements included in Form 10-Qs, or for services that are normally provided by the accountants in connection with statutory and regulatory filings or engagements, including professional services related to the audit of the Companys internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) Audit related fees were for assurance and related services that are reasonably related to the performance of the audit or review of the Companys consolidated financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such services include consultations on financial accounting and reporting standards and acquisition-related due diligence services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) Tax fees were for tax compliance related to tax audits and professional services rendered for international tax consulting in each of the indicated fiscal years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) Other fees were for access to certain research services of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed summaries of the services provided by PwC and the related fees and determined that the provision of non-audit services is compatible with maintaining the independence of PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted procedures for pre-approval of services provided by PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these procedures, all services to be provided by PwC must be pre-approved by the Audit Committee, or can be pre- approved by the Chairman of the Audit Committee subject to ratification by the Audit Committee at its next meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management makes a presentation to the Audit Committee (or the Chairman of the Audit Committee, as applicable) describing the types of services to be performed and the projected budget for such services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Following this presentation, the Audit Committee advises management of the services that are approved and the projected level of expenditure for such services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the fees reported above were approved by the Audit Committee in accordance with its procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposal to ratify the appointment of PwC will be approved by the stockholders if it receives the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy at the meeting and entitled to vote on the proposal.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither our By-laws nor other governing documents or law require stockholder ratification of the selection of PwC as our independent auditor.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Audit Committee was comprised of three directors both prior to and following the Merger, all of whom were independent as defined by NASDAQ Rule 5605.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, all 2016 Audit Committee members were designated by the Board as Audit Committee Financial Experts under applicable rules and regulations of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has and continues to operate under a written charter adopted by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This charter is reviewed at least annually by the Audit Committee and the Board and amended as determined appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews the Companys financial reporting process on behalf of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee approves and retains the Companys independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the Companys internal controls, including internal control over financial reporting, and the financial reporting process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm is responsible for performing an audit of the Companys financial statements and an audit of the Companys internal control over financial reporting in accordance with standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB); and to issue a report thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committees responsibility is to oversee these processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this context, the Audit Committee has met and held discussions with management and PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management represented to the Audit Committee that the Companys financial statements were prepared in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP), and the Audit Committee has reviewed and discussed the audited financial statements with management and PwC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with PwC the matters required to be discussed under the rules adopted by the PCAOB.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has discussed with PwC the firms independence from the Company and its management and has received the written disclosures and the letter from PwC required by applicable requirements of the PCAOB regarding the independent accountants communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed with PwC the overall scope and plans for their audits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee meets with PwC, with and without management present, to discuss the results of PwCs examinations, their evaluations of the Companys internal controls, and the overall quality of the Companys financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon the Audit Committees discussions with management and PwC and the Audit Committees review of the representations of management and the report of PwC to the Audit Committee, the Audit Committee recommended that the Board include the audited financial statements in the Companys Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016 filed with the SEC.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act and Section 14A of the Exchange Act, the Company seeks a non-binding advisory vote from its stockholders to approve the compensation of its Named Executive Officers as disclosed in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal is also referred to as the Say- on-Pay vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee has overall responsibility for evaluating and determining the Companys executive compensation, and all of the members of the Board approve the compensation of the Executive Chairman and the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee was during 2016, and is currently comprised solely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Discussion and Analysis (CD&A) in this Proxy Statement provides an extensive description of the process and substance of the activity of the HR Committee in determining executive compensation generally and for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DENTSPLY SIRONAs compensation philosophy is designed to align executive compensation with our short- term and long-term performance, and to provide the compensation and incentives needed to attract, motivate and retain key executives who are crucial to our long-term success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this philosophy, a significant portion of the total compensation opportunity for our executives is directly related to our stock price performance and to other performance factors that measure our progress against our strategic and operating plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Below is a summary of some key points of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We emphasize pay for performance and tie a significant amount of our Named Executive Officers pay to performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with our performance based compensation philosophy, we reserve the largest portion of potential compensation for performance and equity based programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance based annual incentive program rewards short-term performance, while our equity incentive awards, coupled with our mandatory stock ownership guidelines, reward long-term performance and align the interests of our executives with those of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance goals under our annual bonus program and, as applicable, under our equity incentive awards, focus on objectives that the HR Committee believes can drive the Companys performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that our compensation programs are aligned with the long-term interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that equity incentive awards coupled with our stock ownership guidelines serve to align the interests of our executives with those of our stockholders, by encouraging long-term performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, equity awards are a key component of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock options, restricted stock units, and performance restricted stock units more closely align the long-term interests of our executives with those of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is because the recipient will realize a higher level of compensation if our stock price increases over the life of the option and restricted stock unit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide competitive pay opportunities to attract and retain talented executive management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee consistently reviews our executive compensation program to ensure that it provides competitive pay opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We target the 50th percentile of the market for base salary, annual target cash compensation levels, and our equity compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This positioning places greater emphasis on long-term risk-based pay, alignment with stockholder interests and long-term retention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders are urged to read the CD&A, which discusses in detail our compensation policies, procedures and practices, and the accompanying Executive Compensation Tables.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The HR Committee and the Board believe that these policies, procedures and practices are effective in implementing our compensation philosophy and in achieving the Companys goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This advisory stockholder vote gives you, as a stockholder, the opportunity to endorse or not endorse our executive pay program and policies through the resolution below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the philosophy and approach described in the CD&A and summarized above has worked well for the Company, as historically the Company has delivered solid performance and returns to its stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board strongly endorses the Companys executive compensation program and recommends that the stockholders vote in favor of the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the compensation paid to the Companys Named Executive Officers, as disclosed pursuant to Item 402 of Regulation S-K, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, compensation tables and narrative discussion, is hereby APPROVED.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the advisory vote is non-binding and will not require the Company to take any action, the HR Committee and the Board will consider our stockholders vote and take any concerns into account in future determinations concerning our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote FOR the approval  of the compensation of the Companys Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADVISORY VOTE ON FREQUENCY TO HOLD VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Background
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act and Section 14A of the Exchange Act, the Company seeks a non-binding advisory vote from its stockholders to indicate how frequently they believe we should seek an advisory Say-On-Pay vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Companys 2011 Annual Meeting, the majority of our stockholders voted to advise us to include a Say-On-Pay proposal every year, and the Board determined that the Company will hold an advisory stockholder vote on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A non-binding, advisory vote on the frequency of Say-On-Pay proposals must be held at least once every six years, including this year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are seeking an advisory determination from our stockholders as to the frequency with which we should present a Say-On-Pay vote to the stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders have the option of selecting a frequency of three years, two years, one year, or abstaining.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the reasons described below, our Board recommends that our stockholders select a frequency of one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Companys 2011 Annual Meeting, our stockholders expressed a preference that advisory votes on executive compensation occur every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the results of that vote, the Board determined to implement an advisory vote on executive compensation every year until the next vote on the frequency of stockholder votes on executive compensation, which will occur with this 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After careful consideration of the Companys Say-on-Pay vote results over the past six years, input received through our stockholder outreach process, the Say-on-Pay vote frequency for comparable companies and other matters the Board considered to be relevant, the Board determined to recommend that the stockholders continue to hold the advisory vote on executive compensation every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In formulating its recommendation, the Board considered that an annual advisory vote on executive compensation will allow the Companys stockholders to provide the Company with their direct input on the Companys compensation philosophy, policies and practices as disclosed in the proxy statement every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, an annual advisory vote on executive compensation is consistent with the Companys policy of seeking input from, and engaging in discussions with, the Companys stockholders on corporate governance matters and the Companys executive compensation philosophy, policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following resolution will be submitted for a stockholder vote at the Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that an advisory stockholder vote to approve the compensation paid to DENTSPLY SIRONAs Named Executive Officers, as disclosed in the CD&A, compensation tables and narrative discussion, be submitted to DENTSPLY SIRONAs stockholders every:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) three years,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) two years or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) one year; with such frequency that receives the highest number of votes cast being the preferred advisory vote of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is advisory, and therefore not binding on the Company, the HR Committee or our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders are not being asked to approve or disapprove of the Boards recommendation, but rather to indicate their own choice as among the frequency options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote for every ONE YEAR as the frequency for an  advisory vote on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016 at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders, stockholders of the Company had the opportunity to vote, on an advisory basis, on the Companys executive compensation.

sentences.text: Ninety-eight percent (98%) of the stockholders who voted on the matter approved, on an advisory basis, the Companys executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee viewed this as strong support of the Committees approach to the determination and setting of the compensation of the Companys executives and continued to apply the same effective principles and philosophies that have been applied in prior years when making compensation decisions for 2016.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Throughout the year, we are engaged with our actively-managed stockholders, which represent in the aggregate a majority of our shares.
